verses.verse: And the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to me saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> set <S%H7760><s%> your face <S%H6440><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon, <S%H5983><s%> and prophesy <S%H5012><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> them,

and say <S%H559><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon, <S%H5983><s%> 'Hear <S%H8085><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H136><s%> God! <S%H3068><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "Because <S%H3282><s%> you said, <S%H559><s%> 'Aha! <S%H1889><s%>' against <S%H413><s%> My sanctuary <S%H4720><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> it was profaned, <S%H2490><s%> and against <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> it was made <S%H8074><s%> desolate, <S%H8074><s%> and against <S%H413><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> they went <S%H1980><s%> into exile, <S%H1473><s%>

therefore, <S%H3651><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> I am going to give <S%H5414><s%> you to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the east <S%H6924><s%> for a possession, <S%H4181><s%> and they will set <S%H3427><s%> their encampments <S%H2918><s%> among you and make <S%H5414><s%> their dwellings <S%H4908><s%> among you; they will eat <S%H398><s%> your fruit <S%H6529><s%> and drink <S%H8354><s%> your milk. <S%H2461><s%>

"And I shall make <S%H5414><s%> Rabbah <S%H7237><s%> a pasture <S%H5116><s%> for camels <S%H1581><s%> and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%> a resting <S%H4769><s%> place <S%H4769><s%> for flocks. <S%H6629><s%> Thus you will know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>"

'For thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "Because <S%H3282><s%> you have clapped <S%H4222><s%> your hands <S%H3027><s%> and stamped <S%H7554><s%> your feet <S%H7272><s%> and rejoiced <S%H8055><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> the scorn <S%H7589><s%> of your soul <S%H5315><s%> against <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%>

therefore, <S%H3651><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> I have stretched <S%H5186><s%> out My hand <S%H3027><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> you, and I shall give <S%H5414><s%> you for spoil <S%H957><s%> to the nations. <S%H1471><s%> And I shall cut <S%H3772><s%> you off <S%H3772><s%> from the peoples <S%H5971><s%> and make you perish from the lands; <S%H6><s%> I shall destroy <S%H776><s%> you. Thus you will know <S%H8045><s%> that I am the Lord. <S%H3045><s%> "

'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "Because <S%H3282><s%> Moab <S%H4124><s%> and Seir <S%H8165><s%> say, <S%H559><s%> 'Behold, <S%H2009><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> is like all <S%H3605><s%> the nations, <S%H1471><s%>'

therefore, <S%H3651><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> I am going to deprive <S%H6605><s%> the flank <S%H3802><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> of [its] cities, <S%H5892><s%> of its cities <S%H5892><s%> which are on its frontiers, <S%H7097><s%> the glory <S%H9469><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> Beth-jeshimoth, Baal-meon, and Kiriathaim, <S%H7156><s%>

and I will give <S%H5414><s%> it for a possession, <S%H4181><s%> along <S%H5921><s%> with the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon, <S%H5983><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the east, <S%H6924><s%> that the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%> may not be remembered <S%H2142><s%> among the nations. <S%H1471><s%>
"Thus I will execute <S%H6213><s%> judgments <S%H8201><s%> on Moab, <S%H4124><s%> and they will know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>"

'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "Because <S%H3282><s%> Edom <S%H9000><s%> has acted <S%H6213><s%> against the house <S%H1004><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> by taking <S%H5358><s%> vengeance, <S%H5359><s%> and has incurred <S%H816><s%> grievous <S%H816><s%> guilt, <S%H816><s%> and avenged <S%H5358><s%> themselves upon them,"

therefore, <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "I will also stretch <S%H5186><s%> out My hand <S%H3027><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> Edom <S%H9000><s%> and cut <S%H3772><s%> off <S%H3772><s%> man <S%H120><s%> and beast <S%H929><s%> from it. And I will lay <S%H5414><s%> it waste; <S%H2723><s%> from Teman <S%H8487><s%> even to Dedan <S%H1719><s%> they will fall <S%H5307><s%> by the sword. <S%H2719><s%>

"And I will lay <S%H5414><s%> My vengeance <S%H5360><s%> on Edom <S%H9000><s%> by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of My people <S%H5971><s%> Israel. <S%H3478><s%> Therefore, they will act <S%H6213><s%> in Edom <S%H9000><s%> according to My anger <S%H639><s%> and according to My wrath; <S%H2534><s%> thus they will know <S%H3045><s%> My vengeance, <S%H5360><s%>" declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God. <S%H3068><s%>

'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "Because <S%H3282><s%> the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> have acted <S%H6213><s%> in revenge <S%H5360><s%> and have taken <S%H5358><s%> vengeance <S%H5359><s%> with scorn <S%H7589><s%> of soul <S%H5315><s%> to destroy <S%H4889><s%> with everlasting <S%H5769><s%> enmity, <S%H342><s%>"

therefore, <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I will stretch <S%H5186><s%> out My hand <S%H3027><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> the Philistines, <S%H6430><s%> even cut <S%H3772><s%> off <S%H3772><s%> the Cherethites <S%H3774><s%> and destroy the remnant <S%H6><s%> of the seacoast. <S%H7611><s%> <S%H3220><s%>

"And I will execute <S%H6213><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> vengeance <S%H5360><s%> on them with wrathful <S%H2534><s%> rebukes; <S%H9640><s%> and they will know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord <S%H3068><s%> when I lay <S%H5414><s%> My vengeance <S%H5360><s%> on them."' "
